title: REST API V2
description: A generic connector for accessing HTTP and REST APIs .

help.description: Will send a GET/POST/PUT/DELETE HTTP request and parse the response back to the flow

dontThrowErrorFlg.label: Don`t throw Error on Failed Calls

splitResult.label: Split Result if it is an Array
splitResult.note: After making the request, and applying the above JSONata expression, if the result is an array and this box is checked, we will emit one message for each element of the array.

delay.label: Delay
delay.note: Delay calling the next request after the previous request. Time for the delay is calculated as `Delay`/ `Call Count` and shouldn't be more than 1140 seconds (19 minutes due to platform limitation). The `Call Count` value by default is 1. If you want to use another value, please set the `Call Count` field.

callCount.label: Call Count
callCount.note: Value should be set only in pair with `Delay`, defaults to 1

requestTimeoutPeriod.label: Request timeout
requestTimeoutPeriod.note: Timeout period in milliseconds while component waiting for server response, should be positive integer (1-1140000), defaults to 100000 (100 sec)
